name: Speed Blocks
description:
Description

Tetris with a time limit (and some other twists).  Score as many points as possible in 60 seconds.

How to play

Blocks are each worth 10 points.  When you clear a row or rows, each color block adds to a multiplier for that specific clear.  If you clear 3 green blocks, the first green block is worth 10, the second green block is worth 20, and the third is worth 30.  Total of 60 points from green.  If you clear multiple rows at once, all cleared blocks are added to the multiplier for that clear. 

Get as many points as you can in 60 seconds.  You can hold one block at a time per normal Tetris.  Blocks are not set colors and are random when spawned.

You can pause the game once per game.

Controls

Left - Left arrow or a

Right - Right arrow or d

Rotate - Up arrow or w

Drop faster - Down arrow or s

Instant drop - Space bar

Hold block - X

Pause game - P

Credits

Original Music from Soundshifter on Newgrounds
